    A

    addTransaction(double, String) - Method in class controller.ExpenseTrackerController
    Adds a new transaction if input is valid.
    addTransaction(Transaction) - Method in class model.ExpenseTrackerModel
    Adds a transaction to the list.
    AmountFilter - Class in filter
    Filters transactions based on a specified amount threshold.
    AmountFilter(double) - Constructor for class filter.AmountFilter
    Creates a filter that allows transactions up to the given maximum amount.
    applyFilter(TransactionFilter) - Method in class controller.ExpenseTrackerController
    Applies a given filter strategy and updates the view with filtered transactions.

    C

    category - Variable in class model.Transaction
    Category of the transaction (e.g., food, travel)
    CategoryFilter - Class in filter
    Filters transactions by a specific category.
    CategoryFilter(String) - Constructor for class filter.CategoryFilter
    Creates a filter that matches a specific transaction category.
    controller - package controller
     

    E

    ExpenseTrackerController - Class in controller
    Controller class for managing interactions between the model and view.
    ExpenseTrackerController(ExpenseTrackerModel, ExpenseTrackerView) - Constructor for class controller.ExpenseTrackerController
    Constructs the controller with the given model and view.
    ExpenseTrackerModel - Class in model
    The ExpenseTrackerModel class maintains a list of transactions.
    ExpenseTrackerModel() - Constructor for class model.ExpenseTrackerModel
    Constructs a new ExpenseTrackerModel with an empty list of transactions.
    ExpenseTrackerView - Class in view
    The ExpenseTrackerView class builds the GUI using Java Swing components.
    ExpenseTrackerView() - Constructor for class view.ExpenseTrackerView
    Constructs the ExpenseTrackerView GUI layout.

    Returns the model backing the transactions table.
    getTimestamp() - Method in class model.Transaction
    Gets the timestamp of the transaction.
    getTotalCost() - Method in class model.ExpenseTrackerModel
    Calculates the total cost of all transactions.
    getTransactions() - Method in class model.ExpenseTrackerModel
    Returns the list of all transactions.
    getTransactionsTable() - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView

    I

    InputValidation - Class in controller
    A utility class for validating user inputs in the Expense Tracker application.
    InputValidation() - Constructor for class controller.InputValidation
    Default constructor.
    isValidAmount(String) - Static method in class controller.InputValidation
    NEW: Checks if a string represents a valid amount.
    isValidCategory(String) - Static method in class controller.InputValidation
    Validates that the category is not null, non-empty, alphabetic, and one of the predefined valid categories.

    R
